mapper.select: SELECT recipe_ingredient_id, recipe_id, i.food_ingredient_small_id, s.small as food_ingredient_small_name, is_essential, quantity, create_date, update_date FROM Ingredient i join Food_ingredient_small s on i.food_ingredient_small_id = s.food_ingredient_small_id WHERE i.recipe_id = #{recipe_id}
SELECT cooking_steps_id, recipe_id, steps, description, tip, step_image create_date, update_date, time FROM Cooking_steps WHERE recipe_id = #{recipe_id}

SELECT comment_id, comment_user as comment_user_id, u.nickname as comment_user_name, recipe_id, c.description, c.create_date, c.update_date, c.delete_date FROM Comments c join User u on c.comment_user = u.user_id WHERE recipe_id = #{recipe_id}
